title: Explosive Revelations About The Election (1392)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the troubling allegations of irregularities in the 2020 election. I discuss the strange voting patterns in nursing homes, the use of Dominion Voting Systems, and the various issues with this voting program. 

News Picks:

Officials raised serious concerns about Dominion voting systems.


Did a pipe really “burst” in Georgia on election night?


Concerns about Dominion voting systems are serious, and worth a review. 

Seems Dominion Voting Systems employees really like Democrats.


Why is the rate of rejection for mail in ballots different this year? What is going on?


Here’s the 2012 NY Times article about mail in voting, discussed in the show.

The backup plan for President Trump is a run in 2024.

The future for the GOP is bright, despite the Democrats’ claims otherwise.


Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved.
